item.title: Invoking the command line with python
item.description: is a tool for building interactive command line applications in python. It’s main aim is to make work easy for developers and help them to…
item.link: https://gatsby-starter-blog-demo.netlify.com//Building an interactive command line with python/
item.guid: https://gatsby-starter-blog-demo.netlify.com//Building an interactive command line with python/
item.content:encoded:
cmd2 is a tool for building interactive command line applications in python. It’s main aim is to make work easy for developers and help them to work fast. It’s a python module and is an extension of cmd (which is a simple framework for writing line-oriented command interpreters).

Installation

```pip install cmd2```
